panels.narration: * develin searches for ff7 screenies and info

right.text: Now no wonder the graphics are so outdated. That's only a year after Quake's release. You've got to be joking. FF7 maybe fun but it's outdated. understand plzkthxbye :)
duke nukem forever is also better than doom3

left.text: Today is June 25th 2004. FF7's release date is May 31st 1998
Duke Nukem Forever is the best vapor-ware ever. Well the second best vaporware ever
